definition: knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The staghorn calculi in both of a patient's kidneys should be removed in the same operation.
sentences.chinese: 双侧肾结石采用一次分侧手术取石。

sentences.english: Urinary tract infections, secondary to kidney stones, accompanied by fever.
sentences.chinese: 尿路感染，续发肾结石伴随发热。

sentences.english: I'm the only one who can get my kidney stones removed for me.
sentences.chinese: 只有我能经历我体内的肾结石被去除。

sentences.english: Some hospitals have opened pediatric kidney stone clinics.
sentences.chinese: 有一些医院甚至开设了儿科肾结石专科门诊。

sentences.english: Kidney stones are globs of salt and minerals that deposit in the urine.
sentences.chinese: 肾结石由共存于尿液中的盐和矿物质相互作用形成的。

sentences.english: Some people with recurrent stones choose to take prescription diuretics to reduce the risk.
sentences.chinese: 有些得复发性肾结石的人选择处方利尿剂来降低风险。

sentences.english: An experimental study was made to observe the nephrolith formation in the kidney-deficiency rats(K-D rats).
sentences.chinese: 本文观察了肾虚体质大鼠实验性肾结石形成的情况。

sentences.english: Treasury Secretary Timothy Geithner has been released from the hospital after undergoing treatment for a kidney stone.
sentences.chinese: 财政部长盖特纳因肾结石接受治疗后出院了。

sentences.english: Check with your doctor if you think you have kidney stones.
sentences.chinese: 如果你觉得你患有肾结石请及时就医。

sentences.english: Medication can help reduce the risk of kidney stones.
sentences.chinese: 药物治疗可以帮助减少肾结石的发生率。

sentences.english: Objective: To evaluate the surgical treatment of huge staghorn stone.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨巨大鹿角状肾结石的手术方法。

sentences.english: A kidney stone is a solid mass formed when minerals in our urine crystallise.
sentences.chinese: 肾结石是尿液中的矿物质结晶而成为的固体。

sentences.english: Methods Using intraoperative ultrasound in monitoring lithotomy of 55 cases of complex renal stones.
sentences.chinese: 方法在复杂性肾结石术中实时超声监视。

sentences.english: Kidney stones in infants are very rare.
sentences.chinese: 婴幼儿患肾结石是十分罕见的。

sentences.english: Summer heat, sweat, and dehydration have always been a perfect recipe for kidney stones.
sentences.chinese: 夏季天热，多汗和脱水常常是肾结石的完美诱因。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the surgical effect of the removal of renal giant staghorn calculi.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨巨大鹿角形肾结石的手术方法及其疗效。
